name: Energetic Mood
description: Dynamic and vibrant atmosphere with active composition and high-energy undertones

prompt.base: Energetic dynamic atmosphere, vibrant mood, active composition, high-energy environment, lively tone, kinetic undertones, electric atmosphere, pulsing energy, vigorous mood
prompt.positive: energetic atmosphere, dynamic mood, vibrant setting, active composition, high-energy environment, lively tone, kinetic energy, electric atmosphere, pulsing vitality, vigorous mood, animated setting, powerful energy
prompt.negative: lethargic mood, static atmosphere, low-energy setting, sluggish tone, passive environment, dull mood, lifeless atmosphere

technical.lighting: Dynamic lighting with movement and energy
technical.color_palette: Vibrant, saturated colors with high contrast

variations.name: Athletic Energetic
variations.modifier: sports action, physical dynamism, competitive energy, athletic vigor, performance intensity

variations.name: Party Energetic
variations.modifier: celebration mood, festive atmosphere, social energy, dancing vitality, joyful excitement

variations.name: Urban Energetic
variations.modifier: city pulse, metropolitan energy, fast-paced life, urban dynamism, modern vitality

examples: A dance floor with energetic atmosphere, dynamic lighting, vibrant and lively mood with pulsing energy
An action scene with high-energy composition, kinetic atmosphere, vigorous and electric mood
